title: Microprose Grand Prix World
description:
Game Title: Grand Prix World
Published by: Microprose
Developed by: Microprose
Release date: 2000
Platform: PC

Description: Grand Prix World is a detailed management game of running a F1 Racing Team during the 1998 season. The game seeks to capture the excitement and colour of the TV coverage of F1, focusing on areas that the public are familiar with; squabbling drivers and teams, politics, tyre wars, big money deals, sponsors, pit stops and race tactics.

Installation:

Use Daemon Tools CD emulator to run CD and install.

View the CD Directory and apply patches in the following folders:
"_crack", "_editors", "_patches".


****** - Note - *****

Its been a while since I ran this game. So be prepared to mess with the settings to get it to work right.

You have to change your resolution down to 16bit. But its not a big deal!


This game is perfect for when those racing sims dont satisfy your geeky f1 urges!

-Sonic-
